label.string: Use Sales Description of Odoo Product

div.div:
If checked, it will be attached with Shopify Store's Product's description.
- This configuration applies to all Shopify instances, not to particular one.
- The Description value is being received from Shopify is in HTML format, while it gets stored in Odoo product's field as Text format. Enable this, only if works for you.
- The Odoo product's Sales Description will be used in Sale order line. Generally, the description received from Shopify Store is lengthier. So enable this, only if works for you.
- When a new product from Shopify will be created in Odoo, it will set the Description into Odoo product's Sales Description field.
- When an Odoo product is exported to Shopify Layer, the Sales Description will be added into Shopify product's Description field.

div.name: show_net_profit_report_right_pane
div.div:
- If you enable this configuration, it will add net profit report for all instances
- If you disable this configuration, it will remove net profit report automatically
- You can find Shopify net profit report from Shopify > Reporting > Net profit
- The Shopify net profit report calculate based on instance level sets, analytics accounts & analytics tags
